title: Palabishegam Lyrics Pistha
stanzas:
pal abishegam saamikku
nei abishegam saamikku
malar abishegam saamikku
thaen abishegam saamikku
sandhana abishegam saamikku
avulum malarum saamikku
muthina thaenga saamikku
karpoora deepam saamikku
kannikkum saamikku
ellaam ellaam saamikku

vizhiyaavum oliyaana
guruve en swami
unai paadum
uyir nadham
saranam ayyappaa

vazhiyaavum thuniayaaga
varugindra saashthaan
maname un malar peedam
saranam ayyappaa

sutha sudar maniye
ayyappaa
bakthi pasunganiye
ayyappaa
nithap pournamiye
ayyappaa
sithak kulirpaniye
ayyappaa

arulvizhi malarmugam
adhu enthan manasugam
isai enum ezhu swaram
enakadhu pugal tharum
manikanda mandhiram
ulagil nirandharam

..
...thatta
bagiranga mutta
undhan anbu mottuvida
thunbam vittuvida
enna kattupada
inban vattamida
siva siva saivamum
hari hari vainavam
ivai ini valamvarum
azhagiya thiruthalam
oru malaiye
guru malaiye
arivaai
adhai adainthaal
thuyarillaye
podhuvaai
sivan magane
thiru oliyaai varuvaai

swamiyappa ayyappa
saranam appa ayyappaa
vangala raja ayyappaa
padham vaasaa ayyyappaa
